name: Emilia and Fairy
description:
Synopsis

When a little girl did a task, the goddess gave her hope that her father would come back. She has to overcome all the obstacles. How can she pass the task of a little girl?

Game play

A puzzle game that has to be played in order to pass the levels. There are puzzles to play and must be answered correctly. to pass through the next mission.

Touch your phone screen icon to play the game.
